other_tests.findings: The gallbladder wall is notably edematous. There is a gallstone seen within the gallbladder, which measures approximately 6 mm. The common duct measures 3 mm in diameter. There is no pancreatic ductal dilation. A 2.3 cm cystic focus with a thick wall is seen arising from the inferior aspect of the spleen. The liver demonstrates mild drop of signal consistent with hepatic steatosis. Multiple renal pelvic cysts are seen on the left.
